title: Are Carjackers Leaving Flyers and $100 Bills on Car Windows?
subtitle: Warning claims parking lot carjackers are placing flyers or $100 bills on the windows of cars, then taking the cars when drivers step out of their vehicles to remove them.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Parking lot carjackers are placing flyers or $100 bills on the windows of automobiles, then taking the cars when drivers step out of their vehicles to remove them.
